entries.meaning: In the manner of a fist.
examples: Suppose that while you are comatose, I use your fist, as if it were a hammer, to shatter the window. It seems quite plausible that, although your atoms arranged fistwise cause the window to shatter, you do not.

entries.meaning: By means of the fists; by fighting with the fists.
examples: Sometimes the heroes were foolhardy enough to try taking on the Mummy fistwise.
